docs.snippet: With just two weeks to go before the first votes of the 2016 race for president, Democrats Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders engaged in their most contentious debate match-up to date, underscoring their tightening primary race as the Iowa caucuse...
docs.lead_paragraph: With just two weeks to go before the first votes of the 2016 race for president, Democrats Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders engaged in their most contentious debate match-up to date, underscoring their tightening primary race as the Iowa caucuses draw near.

headline.main: In Tight Race, Democrats Debate Passion Versus Practicality
headline.print_headline: In Tight Race, Democrats Debate Passion Versus Practicality

docs.snippet: Iran ordered a sharp increase in oil output on Monday to take immediate advantage of the lifting of international sanctions, and some foreign firms raced to snap up deals as Tehran emerges from years of international isolation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran ordered a sharp increase in oil output on Monday to take immediate advantage of the lifting of international sanctions, and some foreign firms raced to snap up deals as Tehran emerges from years of international isolation.

headline.main: Iran Boosts Oil Output, Foreign Firms Keen to Seal Deals
headline.print_headline: Iran Boosts Oil Output, Foreign Firms Keen to Seal Deals
